org.eclipse.jetty.util

Class BlockingCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jetty.util.BlockingCallback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callback, Callback.NonBlocking
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class BlockingCallback
extends Object
implements Callback.NonBlocking
    An implementation of Callback that blocks until success or failure.

      • block

        public void block()
           throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Blocks until the Callback has succeeded or failed and after the return leave in the state to allow reuse. This is useful for code that wants to repeatable use a FutureCallback to convert an asynchronous API to a blocking API.
        Throws:
        IOException - if exception was caught during blocking, or callback was cancelled

        public String toString()
        Deprecated.
